Reč ostavka ne postoji u Valverdeovom rečniku
Novi poraz Barselone, ali rezova na Nou Kampu nema

02 Nov 2019

Uporan je čovek Ernesto Valverde. Barselona grca, Barselona jeca, ne igra ni blizu onog kako bi trebalo s obzirom na sastav, ali trener ne misli da je problem u njemu. Prvak Španije je danas doživeo težak udarac na gostovanju kod Levantea, vodio je 1:0 pa izgubio 3:1.
Ali, ako neko misli da će to nešto promeniti na Nou Kampu – neće. Barselona ne igra dovoljno ubedljivo ni u domaćem prvenstvu, ni u Ligi šampiona, međutim, Valvede tera dalje. Ne odustaje.
Na direktno pitanje da li će podneti ostavku posle poraza od Levantea, smireno je odgovorio:„Ne razmišljam o ostavci“.
Jasno i precizno. Pa, ako neko želi da mu vidi leđa, moraće prvo da mu u lice saopšti. A, njemu se sa klupe Barselone ne ide.
Umesto ostavke, novinari su dobili ispraznu frazu na konto poraza.„Moraćemo da analiziramo šta se desilo i zašto smo dopustili da se to dogodi“, rekao je Valverde.
Izjave su mu klasično prodavanje magle. A, rezultati? Titulu ima, ali i dva užasna poraza u završnicama Lige šampiona. Čelnici kluba i dalje veruju u njega...
Foto: Reuters
text:
The word resignation does not exist in Valverde's dictionary
New defeat of Barcelona but no cuts at Nou Camp

02 Nov 2019

Persistent man Ernesto Valverde is persistent. The Barcelona Gracer, the Barcelona Grin, does not play anywhere near as well as he should in terms of composition, but the coach does not think there is a problem with him. The champion of Spain today suffered a heavy blow away from Levante, leading 1-0 and losing 3: 1.
But if anyone thinks it will change anything at Nou Camp - it won't. Barcelona do not play convincingly enough either in the domestic championships or in the Champions League, however, Valvede is pushing further. He does not give up.
Asked directly whether he would resign after his defeat to Levante, he calmly replied, "I'm not thinking about resigning."
Clear and precise. Well, if anyone wants to see his back, he'll have to tell him in the face first. And he's not off the bench from Barcelona.
Instead of resigning, the reporters were given a blank phrase on the account of defeat. "We will have to analyze what happened and why we allowed it to happen," Valverde said.
His statements are classic fog sales. And the results? He has the title but also two terrible defeats in the Champions League finals. Club leaders still believe in him ...
